# Create your own project

Congratulations, you've explored, cloned a project and palyed with a __Tercen workflow__.

Now we show you how to create your own project and show how to create the crabs tutorial from start to end.

<center><img src="images/create_project_crab.png"></center>

The following steps are covered in the next few chapters:

* Create a crabs team
* Create a crabs project (in the team)
* Install a `PCA` operator (for the team)
* Upload the crabs dataset (in the project)
* Create a crabs workflow (in the project)
* Export the results (in the project)

Enjoy the next sections!
